meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of triglyphs.
meanings.sent1: The triglyphic design on the ancient temple was simple and elegant.
meanings.sent2: The architect chose a triglyphic pattern for the cornice of the building.
meanings.sent3: The triglyphic decorations on the wall made the room feel classical and grand.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a triglyphic border that added a touch of sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The triglyphic motif on the vase was a nod to ancient Greek art.

meanings.sent1: The triglyphic road had deep grooves for the rainwater to flow away.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crafted a triglyphic beam with three perfectly aligned channels.
meanings.sent3: The triglyphic drainage system prevented flooding during heavy rains.
meanings.sent4: The triglyphic pattern on the fabric resembled the flow of a river.
meanings.sent5: The triglyphic design on the bridge allowed water to pass smoothly underneath.
